steps.name: Given there is user Alice in Ethereum network with the initial balance <10>Ξ
And there is user Bob in Ethereum network with the initial balance <10>Ξ
When user Alice sends <2>Ξ to user Bob
Then the recipient has balance increased by <2>Ξ
steps.statusMessage: balance should be equal to: expected '20000000000000000000' to equal '12000000000000000000'
